```{r , message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(bookdown)
library(ggplot2)

```


```{r}
crimedata <- read.csv("data/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```

```{r}
tidydata <- crimedata %>%
  filter(Offence.Division == "D Public order and security offences") %>%
  select(Year, 
         Offence.Division,
         Incidents.Recorded)%>%
  mutate(Incidents.Recorded = as.numeric(Incidents.Recorded))
  

ggplot(tidydata,
       aes(Year, Incidents.Recorded))+
  geom_col()
```
